title: Content & Marketing Virtual Assistant (Part-Time)
job_overview:
Experienced Virtual Assistant Needed. Pays well.

I am looking for an experienced virtual assistant who is SMART, FAST, and works hard. I've built great relationships with teaUpgrade to see actual infombers for my in-person business in the past based on supporting their growth and encouraging their talents and passions, but this will be my first VA hire. I expect to have a similar style and relationship where we grow together in this new endeavor. 

I would like to find someone hard working, honest, and with a great eye for creating engaging content geared for social media attention.

Must be technologically savvy and be able to meet deadlines. Initial expectations will focus on social media post creation. For the right person, the job will expand based on your interests and capabilities.  

If this sounds like you,  please reply with a sample of a Facebook post and caption that you would create to educate pet owners about the importance of routine monitoring of blood pressure in dogs or cats who have received a diagnosis of chronic kidney disease.
